channel.title: [508 Bulby] Drops Glitch! HELPP!
channel.description:
Hi all,
There are 2 players online (me and alienfreak), i was logged in first and he logged in as second player. When i kill a monster i see the drops instantly on the floor, but if he (alienfreak) kills a monster he doesn't see the drops... Please help me for a fix!
Thanks,
~Omg a waffle

item.title: [508 Bulby] Drops Glitch! HELPP!
item.dc:creator: @DannyIsSoPro DannyIsSoPro
item.description:
@DannyIsSoPro wrote:

Send an update method for ground items or something similar.

I suggest you start with a clean written 317 like Azure or Hyperion.

Read full topic
